select1.label: Identify clients at risk for developing infection of genitalia , rinary or reproductive tract (eg indwelling catheter , fecal incontinence or surgical incision (eg episiotomy )
Explain procedure and its purpose to client
Pull curtain around bed or close the door of the room
Raise bed to a comfortable working position
Lower side rail and assist clients in assuming a dorsal recumbent position
Position water proof pad under buttocks or place bed pan under client
Fold top bed linen towards foot end of bed and raise clients Gown above genital area
Drape client by placing blanket with one corner between legs .one corner pointing toward each side of bed and one corner over chest . side corners around legs and under hips
Help client flex knees and spread legs back to abdomen
Fold lower corner of bat blanket between legs back on to abdomen
Fill wash basin with warm water
Place wash basin and toilet tissue over bed table .place wash clothes in basin

- Provide female genital care Wash hands and wear disposable gloves Wash and dry upper thighs Wash labia majora.then use non dominant hand to gently retract labia from thigh .with dominant hand, wash carefully in skin folds .wipe in direction from perineum to rectum , repeat on opposite side using separate section of wash cloth .rinse , dry area carefully - Separate labia with non dominant hand to expose urthral meatus and vaginal orifice.with dominant hand , wash downward from pubic area towards rectum in one smooth stroke , use separate section of cloth for each stroke , cleanse thorough around labia minora , clitoris and vaginal orifice - If client is on bed pan , pour warm water over perineal area - Dry perineal area thoroughly - Fold lower corner of bath blanket between legas and over perineum . ask client to lower legs and assume side lying position for anal care

Clean anal area Clean anal area first by wiping fecal material with toilet tissue . wash by wiping from vagina toward anus with one stroke . discard wash cloth . repeat with clean cloth until skin is clear of fecal matter Rinse area well and dry with bath towel Remove disposable gloves and dispose in proper receptacle Assist client in assuming comfortable position Remove bath blanket and dispose of all soiled bed linen . return unused equipment to storage area Raise bedside rail and lower bed to proper height . return room to the condition before procedure Wash hands
Inspect surface of external genitalia and surrounding skin after cleaning
Record procedure and abnormal finding (eg any discharge or condition of genitalia )
